definition: to act on/to affect/action/function/activity/impact/result/effect/purpose/intent/to play a role/corresponds to English -ity, -ism, -ization/CL:個|个[ge4]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to have an effect/to play a role/to be operative/to work/to function
psychological effect/subjective experience affected more by one's expectations than by objective reality/figment of the imagination
assimilation/anabolism (biology)/constructive metabolism (using energy to make proteins etc)

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antiproliferative effects of folate on ovarian cancer cells.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討葉酸對卵巢癌細胞增殖的影響及作用機制。

sentences.english: Considerable attention is given to the action of centrifugal force in grinding wheels.
sentences.chinese: 磨牀砂輪的離心力作用受到相當的關注。

sentences.english: Some drug have the effect that protect liver.
sentences.chinese: 有些藥是有保肝作用的。

sentences.english: Other 5 monomers had no obvious effect on the expression of HIF-1.
sentences.chinese: 其它5種單體與對照比較無明顯作用趨勢。

sentences.english: So Governor, thank you for your leadership on this bill.
sentences.chinese: 所以州長先生，感謝你在這項法案上起到的領導作用。

sentences.english: Of course, we don’t accept the unrealistic overstatement about reverse merger.
sentences.chinese: 當然我們並不認同那些片面誇大反向收購作用的作法。

sentences.english: Objective To study the anti-inflammatory and analgesic effects of Aralia echinocaulis Foot bark.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討刺莖楤木根皮的抗炎鎮痛作用。

sentences.english: This study demonstrated A. pseudoalhagi extract has no significant side effects on rats.
sentences.chinese: 本研究證明駱駝刺提取物對大鼠無明顯毒副作用。

sentences.english: Conclusions Osteoclast-mediated bone resorption was inhibited by the bisphosphonate administration.
sentences.chinese: 結論雙膦酸鹽對破骨細胞性骨吸收有明顯的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Acute toxicity test, mutation test and single-cell gel electrophoresis(SCGE)were used.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解三氯乙醛的毒性和致突變作用。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the in vitro antitumor action of the different extracts of different solvents from Ganoderma lipsiense.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討樹舌靈芝各溶劑提取物的抗癌作用。

sentences.english: C has no therapeutic action on AA mouse.
sentences.chinese: 菝葜提取物C組分對AA小鼠沒有治療作用。

sentences.english: Baclofen was more effective in inhibiting field potentials than GABA.
sentences.chinese: 繼而，左旋巴氯芬抑制場電位作用強於GABA。

sentences.english: Making use of the expression of the image-force, we analyze the interaction of the dislocation with the interface and the boundary.
sentences.chinese: 通過像力公式可以分析自由邊界和界面對位錯的作用。

sentences.english: Strategic communication plays an important role in the implementation of its corporate strategy.
sentences.chinese: 戰略溝通在提升企業戰略執行力中具有重要作用。

sentences.english: The criminal personality plays an important role in severely violent crimes.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪人格在嚴重暴力犯罪中起着重要作用。

definition: to display/to exhibit/to bring out implicit or innate qualities/to express (a thought or moral)/to develop (an idea)/to elaborate (on a theme)
to have an effect/to play a role/to be operative/to work/to function
to promote (an idea or cause)/to advance/boost
